text: Blakes 7 also known as Blake's 7 is a British science fiction television series that ran from 2 January 1978 to 21 December 1981 comprising 4 seasons and 52 episodes that aired on BBC One. It was created by Terry Nation and starring Gareth Thomas, Paul Darrow, Sally Knyvette, Jan Chappell, Stephen Greif, Peter Tuddenham, Steven Pacey, Glynis Barber, Josette Simon, Brian Croucher. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 television series debuts Category:1981 television series endings Category:1970s British television series debuts Category:1980s British television series Category:British science fiction television series Category:English-language television programs Category:1981 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Blakes 7
